column4: Does any one know where I can get the dirver for the GUI ndiswrapper it ask for a inf (the driver is for "0b:00.0 Network controller: Broadcom Corporation BCM4311 802.11b/g WLAN (rev 01)" ??
or is there a easer way to install this
i think you have to download that from microsoft's website
check the ndiswrapper website, i think it's http://ndiswrapper.sf.net/
